experience.title: Next Leap Product Manager Fellowship
experience.description: ¬∞ Successfully completed a comprehensive Product Management Fellowship, focusing on product strategy, user research, and agile methodologies.¬∞ Collaborated with experienced mentors to develop practical skills in product development, market analysis, and data-driven decision-making.¬∞ Led hands-on projects, implementing product roadmaps and launching features to enhance user experience.¬∞ Engaged in extensive networking opportunities, connecting with industry professionals and expanding professional network.¬∞ Acquired in-depth knowledge of product lifecycle management, competitive analysis, and stakeholder communication.
